basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - C&I- The Allen Family Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education & Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education or Early Childhood Education. Eligibility Requirements Pursuing undergraduate degree in Elementary Education or Early Childhood Education Must be sophomore classification or above at the time scholarship is awarded 3.0 GPA or higher Provide two letters of recommendation from faculty or a community member U.S. Citizen Oklahoma resident Demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Sophomore   or SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
